name: Sandbox Physics
description:
Welcome to the Sandbox Physics ! There you can do every strange physics stuff on some free space ;).

You have 11 objects: (more coming soon)

  1. Block
  2. Coal
  3. Sand
  4. Water
  5. Lava
  6. Fire
  7. Bomb
  8. Magnet
  9. Vent
  10. Crane
  11. Human

Coming soon or planned:

  • Car
  • Helicopter
  • Generator
  • Nuclear bomb

Right now game in Alpha stage, so it doesn't have ALL stuff.
